content: 6.8/18 Powder cartridges (single, long) Single .27 caliber long cartridges for use with powder-actuated nailers ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Delivers the most reliable fastenings and highest productivity when used with Hilti DX nailers Designed specifically for use with Hilti powder-actuated tools as part of a matched tolerance system Applications Powder-actuated fastening of threaded studs to concrete and steel for hanging sprinkler pipe systems and other similar applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with (tools): DX 600N Cartridge type: .27 caliber long single Approvals: CIP Technical Data | For use with (tools) | DX 600N | Cartridge type | .27 caliber long single | Approvals | CIP | Cartridge strip capacity | 1 | Storage temperature - min. | 41 °F | Storage temperature - max. | 77 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 50506 - Cartridge 6.8/18 .27 cal black - Package Size 100 pc - 50317 - Cartridge 6.8/18 .27 cal red - Package Size 100 pc - 50316 - Cartridge 6.8/18 .27 cal yellow - Package Size 100 pc
